entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:30 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 01:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: -15.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard developing late in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
